definition: to see profit and forget morality (idiom); to act from mercenary considerations/to sell one's soul for gain
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
surname Li
sharp/favorable/advantage/benefit/profit/interest/to do good to/to benefit
to forget/to overlook/to neglect
justice/righteousness/meaning/foster (father etc)/adopted/artificial (tooth, limb etc)/relationship/friendship
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Some people have sacrificed principle and sought profits at the expense of public interests. They have crossed the moral baseline.
sentences.chinese: 一些人见利忘义，损害公众利益，丧失了道德底线。

sentences.english: Some people have sacrificed principle and sought profits at the expense of public interests.
sentences.chinese: 人见利忘义，损害公众利益，丧失了道德底线。

sentences.english: To forsake good for the sake of gold is not for me.
sentences.chinese: 我不干这种见利忘义的事。

sentences.english: Some people anything to harm the public interest, the loss of a moral bottom line.
sentences.chinese: 一些人见利忘义，损害公众利益，丧失了道德底线。

definition: to seek nothing but profit (idiom); personal profit before everything/self-seeking
blinded by greed (idiom)
variant of 唯利是圖|唯利是图[wei2 li4 shi4 tu2]
to open one's eyes wide at the sight of profit (idiom); thinking of nothing but personal gain/money-grubbing
breaking faith and abandoning right (idiom); to betray/treachery/perfidy
everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
to be greedy in getting money
to curry favor (idiom); playing up to those in power/social climbing
harming others for one's personal benefit (idiom); personal gain to the detriment of others
snob
to forget favors and violate justice (idiom); ingratitude to a friend/to kick a benefactor in the teeth
to lose one's head through material greed (idiom)
to value material gain over righteousness
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
two-faced, three knives (idiom); double-cross/double dealing and back stabbing
to damage the public interest for personal profit (idiom); personal profit at public expense/venal and selfish behavior
